website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line product that is truly a sight to behold.
pros: It has almost every bell and whistle you can think of in a modern fireplace
cons: The heat comes from a fan in the top of the unit, which could have an effect on anything placed on the wall above it

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a little over a year at which point it CAUGHT ON FIRE! It was installed properly and all wiring was correct. Even had it on a surge protector.
customer_reviews.author: G. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. Very pleased with appearance and output of heat
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in tact. Installation was easy. Very pleased with appearance and output of heat. It takes a while to heat the room (400 sq ft) but does the job to take the chill off. Installing a new outlet to hide the power cord. I would recommend this product to others. It's a winner for the price. Update: unit quit working. Called Touchstone customer service. Received a voicemail, left a message to call me concerning issue. No call back. I would say that my pleasure with this unit is gone based on completely unsatisfactory customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be bad if it shattered and isn't safety glass
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and modern. Delivered on time and undamaged. It has a aggressive hum when the heater is on. I contacted the manufacturer and am waiting there response. The glass front is large and the documentation doesn't clarify if it is safety glass. It would be bad if it shattered and isn't safety glass. Update I contacted the supplier via email to question the hum. They responded in less than 24 hours. After confirming it was properly installed, I received a replacement unit within 96 hours. The new unit is installed and hum free. The old unit was package per instructions in the replacement unit container and being returned via UPS. Incredible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad i did
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy it online but after reading reviews and watching video on youtube..I'm glad i did! It is absolutely stunning and realistic! I use it daily with or without heat.Great purchase and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: angieD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. It looks great and it gives off good heat. The vent sends the heat upward which is not good for my mantel or tv so I put a hood on it which works out perfect. The hood also sends the heat outward instead of upward. Overall, the Touchstone Onyx 50" Electric Wall Mount Fireplace is the absoultely awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barrett

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best electric fire place on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best electric fire place on the market. Looks so real and I get compliments all the time. I was even able to build a fireplace out of ship lap around it. Best part, if I decide to move, the fire place can come with! Great customer service. You are going to want to buy another one for other rooms of your house. Packaging was great and assembly was easy. You won't be disappoint with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bolt

customer_reviews.title: YES it IS that good.
customer_reviews.text: I actually review electric fireplaces and having reviewed over 40 this is the one I chose for my personal use. A great blend of quality features and value. I definitely invested in a paint-able cord cover. The dangling cord looked bad. I matched the cord cover to the wall paint and it disappeared. I also love the option of changing logs for crystal media.
customer_reviews.author: Bill You

customer_reviews.title: Large size and realistic led flames are very nice
customer_reviews.text: large size and realistic led flames are very nice. Easy to mount and remote is nice. Swapping the logs to crystals seems easy enough (I left the logs in). Although its not flush mounted it doesn't stick out fat, and if you have a mantle/tv above it the 3D/raised look is quite nice. Heater is good. It won't warm the house be definitely a 20x20 room after about 20-30 minutes (in my house, anyway). Blower is quiet but not silent. With a TV on or talking its white noise in the background and easily ignored.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Farber

customer_reviews.title: This item an Amazon best seller and highly reviewed turned out to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: This item an Amazon best seller and highly reviewed turned out to be a piece of junk. I bought one from Home Depot soon after and it was much brighter , more realistic, and throws more heat for the same amount of money. Most important, I use that one every night and it's great. This one has already stopped working and never did work with its remote a very few uses it just stopped working. Altogether. Since it took more than 30 days due to such"gentle" use it received I can't return it so off to the junk heep for the touchstone onyx. Pretty is as pretty does.
customer_reviews.author: BFF

customer_reviews.title: The 'fire" doesn't look as realistic in person as it does in the videos
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this fireplace (Touchstone 80001 - Onyx Electric Fireplace - Black) . It looks ok, but not realistic at all. I don't use the heating mechanism since it doesn't do much to heat our space. Also, it sometimes makes a dull clicking sound about every five seconds when it's on. It's low, but annoying once you notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Soul Diva

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's actually really awesome and the heat really kicks out! I turned a little niche in my wall into a fireplace cove. Easy set up, and pretty simple to switch out the logs/crystals.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: So realistic!
customer_reviews.text: What a great fireplace! I looked at many fireplaces before purchasing this unit but could never find a realistic flame until I found this one! So easy to install. It came in perfect condition. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it is a bit noisy. I would absolutely recommend this fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Looks sexy, however...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Takes forever to heat my 12’x16’x10’ man cave. When it does there’s only a slight difference, which is fine for me, but my wife prefers it HELL HOT! It’s easy to use only after reading the directions a couple of times. (Wife still can’t figure it out) Lastly, the remote doesn’t work. Replaced the batteries and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Its not been terribly cold this winter to use the heat option yet, but we love it. If you know the difference between a hammer and a screw driver, installation will be a piece of cake. I spent the most time for installation on finding the studs in the wall. The lights are great and look very realistic. The lights also work well for an evening glass of wine or just a simple night light. We would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Slick

customer_reviews.title: This is such a good product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good product, especially for the price. It looks SO REALISTIC. We mounted ours in the master bedroom and we love it. We set the timer each evening and it is very relaxing. I am very pleased with this purchase. I bought a fire-crackling sound machine to go with it but the one I got didn't sound very realistic and I ended up finding a FREE sound effect on Amazon Music that is way better. Now we have the whole package!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product this weekend and I have to say it surpassed my expectations. I installed it and a new tv in the master bedroom. The visual quality of the flames are fantastic and the look of the unit as a whole is stunning. Family members have purchased similar fireplaces (a little bigger) and have paid four times the cost of this unit. It's a no brainer. I am not one to write reviews, but I felt obligated in this because I was so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. It is the focal point of our living room now and we love it! Installation was easy, but my only complaint was that directions said to hammer in the drywall anchors. Doing this will just smash the drywall with the size drillbits it recommends. Either drill a bigger hole, or screw the anchor into the hole. But overall very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Bodroghy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic faux fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: In South Florida, fireplaces are few and far between, but I love the character they bring to a home. Got this as a warehouse deal and couldn’t be happier. It took me forever to find some one to build me a surround and understand my vision, but I am completely satisfied with the unit. We purchased an old mantel, had a box built out of drywall, and then added some stone. Cannot speak to the heat feature as we had to disengage since we encased it. The flames are awesome. Hangs very easily like a TV. Hope I made Joanna Gaines proud.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Very classy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this at first, but it is an awesome product! Very classy. I built a mantel for $150 and it looks fantastic. Everyone at home and all my guests love this thing. It is absolutely beautiful. Just bought a second one for the family room.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the small amount of noise coming from this at night. Had it for almost 4 years im still getting compliments on it working perfectly with no issues bought in 2015..its 2019 when Im writing this review. Reccomended to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Real looking , very nice.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Christmas, my wife was very surprised, and happy. It was so nice to have this as it got cool here . We had our tree on our cornered deck so we were out there Christmas morning. My daughter made my wife open this first , she was not even sure that’s what it was. So we got it going for some heat , and to see it, very nice, looks very real. Well it got really cold, for Florida, into the 30’s so it came inside under the TV to help warm the family room 👍😊
customer_reviews.author: Curtis O. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't "flame" anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fireplace for two years and mainly use it in the winter because it heats up the room too much to use it too often in the summer (not a bad thing because we bought it as an extra source of heat). However, after the first year only half of the "fire" lit up and tonight the entire thing is black but the fan for heat still works. I'm not sure if it is a lightbulb or not but it is disappointing that it has faded out so fast. I'm hoping we can fix it for cheap because I really do like it....when it's working properly.
customer_reviews.author: ddp02

customer_reviews.title: The heater doesn't work 😡
customer_reviews.text: Heater is not functioning at all. So mad.... what a waste of time mounting and having to return it. I'll call customer service soon
customer_reviews.author: J.J. F

customer_reviews.title: Lovin it!
customer_reviews.text: I hired a contractor to put it up and he made the comment that mine was nicer than one he had put up at someone else's house (he implied they were pretty well off). I don't know that I will actually use the heat but I love the look of it - the log and the crystals.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Enough heat to fill a room but it does take a little while. The flame effect is really nice. I wish it could have sound and maybe the option to change the color of the flame but other then that it's a very clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really used it for heat output so I gave it 3 stars.. I’m going to assume it’s easy to install cause the guy had no issues ... I brought 2 and they’re great!!!! Looks great in my bedroom and family room.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. We dont plan to use the heat function so we were able to install closer than recommended to other objects. (we live in FL). Only thing I wish it had was Alexa integration. I set it up using the Harmony Hub IR blaster to turn it on and off via Alexa and it works so im happy. Also added an LED light strip... now all thats left is to stone the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fireplace! It is so elegant and SUPER convenient to use. We definitely use it more than a traditional fireplace because of how it is to click a button on the remote. We also love how large it is compared to the smaller ones available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty nice. I use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice. I use it everyday....it's been a long cold winter. It does serve as ambiance also. It throws heat into my living room. I plan to place wood on the wall this beautiful fireplace is on. It will be the focal point of a modern room. I love it. If I had to say anything....the remote could work alittle better. I have to sometimes get up and get closer to get it to work with the remote....but it's worth it and I do love the feel of a fireplace in my living room. Everyone that visits loves it too!!!! Thanks Touchstone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks very modern & sleek, very nice flames
customer_reviews.text: We love our fireplace! It looks beautiful in our living room & gives a nice ambiance. It was very easy to install & seems to be made with quality in mind. It doesn't crank out the heat like a gas log but it does nicely in our living room which is somewhere around 400 sq ft. We use it in the morning & evenings in conjunction with the ceiling fan & it heats the room nicely after a short while. If you're really cold, you can stand in front of it where the heat comes out at the top. We're very happy with our fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is so sleek and beautiful! It does have nice heat output but we have it in a larger open room but as long as you’re close it puts out nice heat! I love to just put on the flames , they’re very peaceful
customer_reviews.author: THERESA MOVILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our master bedroom. Changed out a TV for it and the room is so much nicer. My wife told me she didn't realize how much she would like it until she saw it - well we both love it. I turn it on in the late afternoon and it's nice when walking in and out of the room when it's going. The heater is great too - we used to have a floor space heater since our bedroom is above a garage and in the corner of the house - it would get quite cold. The header is nice and quiet - no loud clicks from relays on the oil filled heaters.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Griffin

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our kitchen/living room renovation. I use it mostly for ambiance but it does put out heat. My brother-in-law built a mantle for us and it just looks incredible! Obviously, the pictures are from Christmas. Best part was that it was under $300 and shipped directly to our front door in two days with Amazon Prime! Again, we LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Unit stopped working after about 1 month
customer_reviews.text: The thing worked perfectly for about a month. One day it just quit. The lights turn on for about 3 seconds then the unit powers itsself off. I'm assuming its a burned motor or something because the fake flames kind of stutter for a second before it powers off. I made several attempts to contact the manufacturer with no responses. I would definitely not recommend this product or anything else by Touchstone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: transformed bedroom from ordinary to cozy hideout
customer_reviews.text: we incorporated an existing built-in bookcase to include this fireplace, a mantle, hearth and candles and transformed our bedroom from ordinary to spectacular. The "fire" did not photograph well.. looks much better in person. Why go to an expensive B&B when we have our hideaway right here at home? We still are not finish hiding the wires to the TV and lighting elements so disregard those as an evil intrusive element in the design. Very minimalist because well, it really isn't a real fireplace with soot and ashes, just the sexy cozy good stuff of warm flickering light. Living in Florida, that's all you need.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just mounted my Touchstone fireplace as well as my TV in a sitting area of my Master Bedroom. The installation was a breeze, I know the instructions recommend that you have two people but I installed it all alone and didn't run into any problems. My wife said that the fireplace is too low but I think it's fine... What else is new...
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product,I recently purchased this electric fiere place i like the option that u could switch of the heater, unfortunately arrived with the front panel shader, i contact the sales representative Evans and he sent me a replacement that also never arrived because was damaged on transit, after there attempts they changed the carrier and after many days of waiting, the front panel arrived. Thanks to Evans and team.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love it, however
customer_reviews.text: Love it, however . it needed a dedicated breaker to be safe and that wasn't mentioned anywhere in the listing. It was in bold letters in the instructions. When I called the company the representative said it wasn't really necessary, but we had one installed anyway. That added about $150 to the cost, but the fireplace is still worth every penny to us. We love it!!! Just be aware there may be more expenses than you plan on.
customer_reviews.author: kelli grant

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic flames and features!!
customer_reviews.text: I reall appreciated (which has nothing to do with the product itself) but the fact that I went with the free shipping which in all fairness couldve taken 2-3 weeks to get. I received it in 1 week. The fireplace is fantastic. I've seen, and installed, quite a but of electric fireplaces being an electrician and all, and the flame features on this look very realistic. Some fireplaces dont have very good graphics and this one looks fantastic. Very pleased with the product! It's a very reasonable price for the quality as well. The only thing that its lacking is a thermostat to keep a regulated temperature but it's honestly not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: LUKE BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Responsive customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the product — it really makes my place cozy and sleek at the same time. I had a brick wall and am renting so couldn't mount, but made a stand out of stove bricks and it looks legit. The flames and ember logs look great (wish the logs flickered though). The heat is so-so. My only issue is that the flame settings weren't working on my unit, but I spoke with their customer support and they replaced my unit (they shipped quickly, but I'm still trying to deal with UPS to track it down — UPS is the worst :/)
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ting

customer_reviews.title: This option is great for a city apartment to give a cozy feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have fires all the time in the winter and really miss it now that I'm living without a fireplace. This option is great for a city apartment to give a cozy feel and as a space heater. I ended up downloading an App on my phone that plays fire sound effects through a wireless speaker to enhance the fire ambiance. You just need to engage in a bit of "willing suspension of disbelief", but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted under our tv. It takes the chill out of our room then we shut it off but leave the fire on. It was packaged great, no issues, went up easy and we get a lot of compliments. There is a little noise when you run the heat but we have never had to turn our tv up because of it. The remote is great, easy to use. Great purchase for us !
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this wall fire place. It was easy to hang, it looks so close to a real fire place and love the fact that it has multiple settings for the fire and you can put it on a timer. Just adds to the ambiance of the room you choose to put it in. We have it in our dining room. Oh and we decided not to use the crystals and just use the faux logs. It really looks amazing for being faux logs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, quality, modern fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous fireplace. It arrived in perfect condition and was simple to install— if you read the directions— and trust me, I’m not “handy”. Definitely secure on studs. I purchased a Costco stud finder that works like a charm. We absolutely love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: For mounting ONTO a wall, not INTO a wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mount into a wall, it’s a nice fireplace if your plan is to mount it ONTO a wall, but not flush/into. The heat/blower is located on the top & back and I’m trying to figure a way to Re-route the heat now without ruining the aesthetic of my mantle. Product looks great & works great, but there are far better option for a flush mount.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Carr

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my new fireplace. My new place doesn’t have a traditional fireplace so this is a great alternative. The heat though isn’t enough to heat up the living room and will produce a loud buzzing sound. Update as of August 31st, they reached out to me. They will send out the missing crystal strip. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Archie John Bongabong

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily as described
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely an attractive unit but if you buy it based on heavy research and watching numerous videos - all of which reflect 5 settings from a glowing ember to a bright flame you’ll surely be disappointed that there are no embers and flame stays the same with variable brightness. Customer service was initially responsive, however, when I screen shotted the description of their unit and sent a video of the non-embers they went silent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Delaurier

customer_reviews.title: Realistic
customer_reviews.text: Got it fast without damage. Got it in our new house awaiting mounting, which will be this weekend. New furniture, new fire place with a new book...perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gives beautiful light. I’m writing this review today because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 2015. Three years and running strong. This past winter my furnace went out and I used it to heat half of the lower level of my house. It gives beautiful light. I’m writing this review today because I am purchasing another one to hang in my bedroom. Note that heat exits from the top so if you’re hanging anything above it you may look into clearances from the manufacturer. And I love having the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Looks real works great no problems
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a little more heat but over all very nice
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! Easily hung (although you will probably need two people to do it). It does extend out about five inches from the wall. I wanted to hide that and the cord, so I built a quick down and dirty shelf out of 4X4s. I love the remote and the timer feature, set it and it runs for 1/2 to six or so hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kevn Alford

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud (even with heat off)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it just didn't work. I turned on the unit and it began emitting an annoying humming sound. I'm not sure if it's just this unit or if this noise is what others find acceptable. I wanted it to work in the new space, but I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Way warmer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Install was a breeze. Included all necessary hardware. I could install the whole thing myself but if you’re on the short side it might be a bit harder. Very nice lighting effects and the heat is very impressive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful warm light. It was easy to install. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace is decent, it’s nothing spectacular. I wish it wasn’t as loud. Sounds like a loud microwave when it’s on. I don’t believe it’s worth $300. Good packaging, secure, easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy, looks awesome,. The only issue was the heat discharge. Had to use a elbow duct work to keep the heat down on the shelves above,. If I put the tv up as suggested it would go past the ceiling. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used just the crystals. Beautiful and extremely realistic flame. I was surprised flam’s hoes up or down according to heat level
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flame but has small clicking sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flame pattern and glowing faux logs. Does have on small negative, the sound it makes when only the flames are on. The sound is like a mechanical ‘click’ about every second, reminds me of a clock on the wall going tick tick tick.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace! I looked online for awhile to pick one out for my bedroom. I love that I can use it without heat and just for the ambient light. The timer is a great feature for bedtime as well. It's beatific and very realistic. My husband and I hung it up in about 15 minutes, very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie NH

customer_reviews.title: Great look and price
customer_reviews.text: The look is great and I could (and do) stare at it for hours (or until I fall asleep). The price for the unit is far an away better than other similar models and I'd recommend it to anyone wanting the ambiance but also looking for an option to not have heat at the same time. Good buy and I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great Fireplace and a Great Price, WOULD RECCOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a long time, it was affordable, a good size, has the option for rocks or little logs, and really heats up the whole floor. It has a couple different settings which is nice but the remote is still simple and to the point. My boyfriend and I set it up in around 25 minutes, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for the price
customer_reviews.text: Terrific for the price. Works great and is truly beautiful on our bedroom wall. It runs quiet, takes the chill off in a snap and is economical. I gave it 5 stars though it is not easy to install by oneself, but I managed. You need a good stud finder and a bit of patience. Once you have the hanging frame securely screwed into your studs if you will remember to take the face glass off before you try to hang the unit, it will go on very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Green

customer_reviews.title: Love the fireplace very much
customer_reviews.text: Love the fireplace very much. We have an open floor plan so it's not going to be used for heating but it does definitely on a cold wet day take the chill out of the air. Just wish the flames could be a little bigger when you press on the control to make it larger. Very easy to install and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful in my living room!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous looking fireplace, it was easy to install and gives a nice warmth to the room. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because it's noisy.
customer_reviews.author: E M R

customer_reviews.title: Wall heater
customer_reviews.text: So far I am content. We use it a lot. The biggest issue right now is for someone who actually uses it more to heat with then temporary looks is that it gets the wall hot from the heat rising at the wall instead of a blow out system.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love my fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Week ago fireplace wall project was finished, and my family and I loved the result!!! Fireplace looks very natural and great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s really beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’m in a new house and missed my other fireplace. It’s installed with a mantle above it. Realistic fire display on a very attractive display. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Boulet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful fireplace. Fire looks so real and it can be recessed into dry wall. However, for recessed installation, heat cannot be turned on unless you have a way to let the hot air to come out. There is a switch to disable the heater for recessed installation.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, heats well. Unit occasionally makes clicking noise. Manufacturer immediately sent a new one. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fire
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fire, good construction. Did have small dent on backside though where mounts to wall and the fake log had a chip but touchstone sent a replacement right away. Like it looks great in room.
customer_reviews.author: Bkocis

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Top 2 purchases i've made on amazon, this makes the place cozy. The heat is decent we only use it for the comfort and coziness. Absolutely worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.author: tarael webster

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We just received our fireplace today and from the picture you can tell we never received the glass cover, instructions, screws this is very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this! I got this for our day spa room. Compliment after compliment! Wonderful, I would buy it again and again! I used a few screws more than came with it! Heavy piece, takes two to lift it up, Worth the effort!
customer_reviews.author: JamieM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! We have only had this for a couple weeks now but we absolutely love it! When you can’t have a real wood burning or gas fireplace this is the next best thing!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, but need help actually getting it up on my wall. For anyone else who purchased this. Any suggestions? Is attachments stable enough to keep this unit in the wall? My husband tried but the nails are very short. Seems unstable??Please help?
customer_reviews.author: LaSheila Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to any room
customer_reviews.text: This wall mounted fireplace did not disappoint. Exactly what I wanted, a beautiful addition to my living room. My son in law and husband had it mounted and on in less than an hour. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a moderately priced wall mounted fireplace. We used the crystals and it is just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Egler

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Highly recommended. Looks very real and heat works just great for a small to medium size room. Definitely worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Mkarski

customer_reviews.title: Installation was simple and easy. The onyx finish looks great
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple and easy. The onyx finish looks great, goes with any decor and the flame affect very realistic. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for an electric fireplace in this price range
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loove it
customer_reviews.text: We framed up a wall for it to be recessed and my wife loves it, so I love it too...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mauder

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! Better than expected. The fire display is amazing. Easy to install. Please do not hesitate to buy this fireplace. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: DionD

customer_reviews.title: Fire looks real
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our bedroom and it really does look great. I look at tons of these things and a girls video on you tube sold me. Her video of it nailed it,. Hope it last along time.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Facts about how it can be viewed were not totally explained in the ad.
customer_reviews.text: This will be great in our master bedroom, however we were disappointed in the fact that you cannot use both the logs and crystals together at the same time. Did not know that until after it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: David Merkle

customer_reviews.title: OMG !!!!!! Looks like a real flame
customer_reviews.text: I just got this fireplace delivered today and it is absolutely beautiful and it was also easy to hang on the wall as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn  Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: The Touchstone wall mount electric LED fireplace is AMAZING! It’s beautiful flame looks so real, and it is a quality item. This is the most beautiful fireplace I have ever owned. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Heat
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Not a lot of heat for the price
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Problems, but nice visuals.
customer_reviews.text: There is a kinda big problem with my heater. On high heat, it doesn't take more that 10 minutes before the heater overheats and shuts off. After which, I have to wait about 5 to 10 minutes before I can turn it on again. The low heat setting is working fine so far though. I love the visuals, but...why is it not working as intended?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cheng

customer_reviews.title: so good! I installed it last night
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I installed it last night, and made sure it worked. It was easy to install. I like the on/off switch on the side. It makes it easy to cut power to the unit. I had it plugged in and I could hear the power going to it, so I simply flipped the switch. I will be back with more info if something should happen.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ware

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it like 5 times and it's already broke!! When you hit the on button on the remote it just clicks but won't come on. Put new batteries and does the same thing! I have no idea how to fix it. SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Futch

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a manufacturer refurbished product. Seemed brand new. Works well, but I don't intend to use it for heat, just the fireplace look.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: But one for the front room first loved it so much when I redid the bedroom upstairs bought one for that room also!! Adds a lot of ambience and warmth to the room planning on buying another when I redo my other bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: pamela d morgan

customer_reviews.title: I was really happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this.....very nice unit....BUT ....I just flipped the switch in the back to get heat & the blower dosent blow.....not a happy camper about that.....really wanted to just heat up the room a bit in the morning - the 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Fuggit

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised....The heat is ok will keep a small room luke warm. Overall nice unit
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very realistic.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Very realistic. As other reviews have noted you’re not going to heat a big room but it does warm things up. The only thing it’s missing is some sound.
customer_reviews.author: GoAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and it looks amazing. Very bright flame. I like the Crystal look verses the log look
customer_reviews.author: JOSIE

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So easy to order, FREE shipping and was delivered on a Sunday. My family happened to be over so I had help to hang it. Very easy instructions for hanging and a very simple install. Looks beautiful and works perfect. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item, not meant for really heating
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation on the product but it didn’t fulfill my needs for actually heating my home. Item unfortunately returned.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love!! I have used it every night and morning when I wake up since I got it installed in my bedroom. I think I have already used it much more than the fireplace we have in the living room and I have only owed it less than a month. Get it - you will love it too!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Satram

customer_reviews.title: Winter nights just got better
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! My bedroom is always chilly and this is not only perfect for heating but gives me something beautiful to look at. So much nicer than a space heater. The flames are so realistic and I plan on enjoying warm winter evenings next to it in a favorite chair with a good book. Such a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY PAVLISKO

customer_reviews.title: A clean perfect fireplace that will make you stare at it just like the old Franklin.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. There is no need to have a dirty fireplace when you can have a clean one that looks great.
customer_reviews.author: James Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was good no damage
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was timely. Packaging was good no damage. Simple to install by simply removing wall mounting bracket and using a stud finder to hit into 3 studs. The Sheetrock anchors work good as well. Easy to hang. I used the log instead of the crystals. The flame and log look awesome and life like. Haven't used to heat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Touchstone 80001 - Onyx Electric Fireplace - (Black) - 50 Inch Wide - On-Wall Hanging - Log & Crystal Included - 5 Flame Settings - Realistic Flame - 1500/750W Timer & Remote
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR ON-WALL MOUNTING: (FOR RECESSED STYLE, SEE OUR SIDELINE MODEL), This 50-inch-wide electric fireplace only weighs 46 pounds, so one person can easily hang it on the wall using the step-by-step instructions provided. Once it has been mounted to your wall, all you need to do is hang and secure your fireplace with the drywall screws. Overall dimensions: 50.4” W x 21.65” H x 5.5” D

VERSATILE USE: Touchstone Onyx Electric Fireplace features two heat settings (high and low) which adds supplemental heat, coming from the top of the firebox. The heater is designed to provide additional heat, not replace a primary heat source. A five-flame brightness setting that ranges from a soft ember glow to a full blaze lets you adjust the flames depending on your desired intensity. The Onyx also can run with no heat as well.

REALISTIC LOG SET: Amaze your guests with the lifelike flames of this wall-hanging electric fireplace. Its realistic flames are set in a pile of faux logs or crystals (both included) that lends the homey appeal of an authentic fireplace. The log set or crystals lie behind durable tempered glass with a contemporary black frame. Enjoy smoke-free air while feeling warm during a cold night.

ELEGANT HOME DÉCOR: Fill a big blank wall with a touch of modernity and elegance. This electric fireplace will serve as functional décor for your bedroom, library, or family room. It can be used at any time of the year, since it has a dual-mode feature that allows the fireplace to operate on low and high heat. A built-in timer for auto-shutoff can be set for 30 minutes to 7.5 hours.

SAFE AND EFFICIENT TO USE: Save on natural gas and oil costs as this fireplace uses LED technology, which requires less energy to heat a room. It’s safe for children and pets, since its LED bulbs are cool to the touch and mercury-free. If mounting below a TV, allow 24” of space between the unit and TV above. The Touchstone Onyx Electric Fireplace guarantees that you get your money’s worth.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars811 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Wireless Remote, Mounting Brackets, Mounting Hardware, Display Crystals & Logset
